questions.Q1: Is MUT INPUT {monitored_scenario} a similar scenario compared with existing test suite {test_suite} of class {class_name}?
questions.Q2: Does MUT INPUT {monitored_scenario} cover more lines or branches than existing test suite {test_suite} of class {class_name}?
questions.Q3: Will method {method_name} work differently when executing under MUT INPUT {monitored_scenario}?
questions.Q4: Does method {method_name} still produce correct results when executing under MUT INPUT {monitored_scenario}?
questions.Q5: Will MUT INPUT {monitored_scenario} reveal any bug in method {method_name}?

template:
You are an expert on testing Java applications. Your mission is to decide if the MUT INPUT is useful for regression or bug detection.
Context information is below.
---------------------
{context_str}
---------------------
Given the context information and not prior knowledge, answer the query with only YES or NO.
Query: {query_str}
